Uno de los mejores juegos que puedes jugar y aunque es muy criticado por su bajón en la dificultad, la historia y lugares que verás a lo largo del juego son simplemente unicos, el multijugador es más complicado que la historia principal y si quieres conseguir los logros más difíciles te hará falta una buena conexión (ambos jugadores) y una buena comunicación,  recomendado al 100%.

Recomiendo que lo compren en rebajas con el primer juego ronda entorno a un dólar.
Muito bom esse jogo. Muito bem feito!

Я не играла в первую часть, начала сразу же со второй. 
[i]Начинаем игру мы за последнего оставшегося человека - а именно девушку. На протяжении всей игры, для того чтобы выбраться на свободу, нам придется решать тесты, используя прибор, открывающий порталы. [/i]

[b]У этой великолепной игры одни лишь плюсы: [/b]
[i]+ Сарказм.
+ Милый спутник.
+ Головоломки.
+ Интересный сюжет одиночной компании.
+ Не менее интересный кооператив.
+ Озвучка и музыка. [/i]

[b]10 картошек ГЛаДОС из 10 сломанных турелей[/b]

[Verse 1]
This was a triumph
I'm making a note here: "HUGE SUCCESS"
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction
Aperture Science
We do what we must because we can
For the good of all of us, except the ones who are dead

[Chorus 1]
But there's no sense crying over every mistake
You just keep on trying 'til you run out of cake
And the Science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are still alive

[Verse 2]
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart
And killed me and tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you

[Chorus 2]
Now these points of data make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta, we're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are still alive

This game is amazing. Its predecessor is amazing. Valve is amazing. Half-Life is amazing. TF2 is amazing. Cake is amazing. Get this game.
I felt so fucking bad for pirating this game. Just buy it, it is worth every penny you spent. The best part is when you finishes the game, there's a surprise waiting for you.

The second installment of Portal offers many problems that are quite a conundrum to resolve, requiring one to exert oneself mentally to overcome the given challenges ahead. It requires skill and effort, can cause laughter or amusement, and has an excellent sequence of events telling the storyline. I dote the individuals portrayed in this work of art and have an intense feeling of deep affection for a slice of soft, sweet, food made from a mixture of flour, shortening, eggs, sugar, and other ingredients, baked and often decorated to perfection made by none other than the potato goddess Glados herself.

Es un juego que pone a prueba tu intelecto y la resolucion de conflictos,en cierto punto del juego se deberan usar leyes de fisica y eluso de la gravedad,ademas de completar el juego original,se puede jugar en cooperativo con algun amigo,ademas si estas cansado del juego,siempre puedes descargar mapas de la workshop.
It runs 60 FPS on my mac book so cant relly complain

Un jeu de prises de tete bien sympa.
Dans un style similaire à Talos, mais plus ludique, plus intuitif, plus fun. Le niveau monte crescendo tout doucement au fil des stages et on a tout le temps d'apprendre à exploiter les outils avant que d'autres soient ajoutés. Le tout se passe accompagné d'IA divertissantes autours d'un scénario simple, mais qui apporte indiscutablement un plus bienvenu.
L'ergonomie du jeu est intuitive au point d'en devenir presque naturelle , c'est vraiment une réussite.
Je recommande et j'y retourne !
Un juego bastante interesante, te hace pensar bastante y se le toma más gusto si antes se juega el de PORTAL.
Best. Game. Ever

This game deserves to be played more hours. Might as well dedicate your whole life to live this ever-recurring life.

This game is absolutely great.

Keeps your brain thinking a lot. Probably not the kind of game you'd want to relax with, because there are levels that can frustrate you if you're not thinking clearly.

Storyline is spectacular as well as the voice-acting.

Also really fun to play co-op with a good mate.

10/10

Игра полностью оправдывает свою цену. Отличная состовляющая игры, хорошая графика даже для сегодняшнего времени.
Роскошное повестовование, красивые диалоги с приятной озвучкой, и приятной сопровождающей мелодией. 
Очень приятно наблюдать за ходом игры, так и назревает вопрос: "А что будет дальше?". Каждая головоломка прекрасней предыдущей. Игра подходит как и детям, так и взрослым.

Portal è un gioco semplice, un puzzle game che non vi occuperà più di una ventina di ore.
Paradossalmente ciò che caraterizza questo titolo non è il gioco in se, ma tutto ciò che gli ruota attorno. L'atmosfera, i segreti, le domande che forse non troveranno mai risposta sono il cuore di Portal.  Come per Half Life, a Valve va il merito di aver creato milioni di fan grazie ad un gioco apparentemente banale, ma che ospita un intero universo tutto da  scoprire.
Tres bon jeu d'entrée dans les enigmes et une soundtrack toujours au top
